short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides definitions in the side panel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lets you save any word to your word bank for future reference. When right clicking on a selected word, you can pull up a sidebar with definitions from Dictionary.com. You can then customize your definition for the word.
